de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.im.manager.simple

Class DefaultImcManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.im.manager.AbstractImManager<org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimc.IMC>
      • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.im.manager.simple.DefaultImcManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImAdapterManager<ImcAdapter>, ImcManager, ImManager<org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimc.IMC>

    public class DefaultImcManager
extends AbstractImManager<org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimc.IMC>
implements ImcManager
    Default IMC manager, that manages IMC and its associated adapters.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  DefaultImcManager.PrimaryImcIdAttribute

    • Constructor Detail

      • DefaultImcManager

        public DefaultImcManager(ImMessageRouter router,
                 ImcAdapterFactory adapterFactory,
                 TnccAdapterFactory tnccFactory)
        Creates a default IMC manager with the given message router, IMC adapter factory and TNCC adapter factory. The factories are used to create the necessary adapters for every IMC. The manager has a maximum IMC ID limit of (reserved IMC ID ANY - 1).
        Parameters:
        router - the message router
        adapterFactory - the IMC adapter factory
        tnccFactory - the TNCC adapter factory

      • DefaultImcManager

        public DefaultImcManager(ImMessageRouter router,
                 ImcAdapterFactory adapterFactory,
                 TnccAdapterFactory tnccFactory,
                 long maxImId)
        Creates a default IMC manager with the given message router, IMC adapter factory and TNCC adapter factory. The factories are used to create the necessary adapters for every IMC. The The maximum IMC ID limit is set by the maximum IMC ID parameter.
        Parameters:
        router - the message router
        adapterFactory - the IMC adapter factory
        tnccFactory - the TNCC adapter factory
        maxImId - the IMC ID limit
